answers.answer: Sadly, The "CURE" is Always 10 years away

I believe up till this time, there is still no known cure for diabetes. The only thing that can be done for now is to have it in control so it will not progress. If you are suffering with this disease, the best thing to do is to work a plan with your doctor to get your sugar level in control.

question: About 40 years ago it was announced on the news that medical science  was  on the verge of a cure for diabetes.   So -- what happened to it?  Where is the cure?
title: What happened to the cure for diabetes?
